body.Subject: Action Required: Set Up Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
body.Body:
Multi-Factor Authentication Setup Required

Dear @{body('Get_user')?['displayName']},
As part of our commitment to protecting your account and company data, we require all users to enable Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA). This adds an extra layer of security to your account.
IMPORTANT: Please complete your MFA setup within the next 7 days.

How to Set Up MFA (4 Easy Steps):

  1. Click the button below to start the setup process
  2. Download Microsoft Authenticator on your mobile device (links below)
  3. Follow the on-screen instructions to link your account
  4. You're done! Your account is now secure
Set Up MFA Now

Download Microsoft Authenticator:

If you have any questions or need assistance, please contact the PLACEHOLDER_SUPPORT_TEAM.
PLACEHOLDER_FOOTER

body.Subject: Reminder #@{item()?['ReminderCount']}: MFA Setup Still Pending
body.Body:
MFA Setup Reminder

Reminder #@{item()?['ReminderCount']}
Dear @{body('Get_user')?['displayName']},
We noticed that you have not yet completed your Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) setup. Securing your account is critical for protecting company data and your personal information.
IMPORTANT: Your MFA setup was due 7 days ago. Please complete this setup immediately to maintain access to company resources.

Quick Setup Guide:

  1. Click the button below to begin
  2. Download Microsoft Authenticator (if not already installed)
  3. Scan the QR code with your phone
  4. Complete verification - Done in 2 minutes!
Complete MFA Setup Now

Download Microsoft Authenticator:

If you have any questions or need assistance, please contact the PLACEHOLDER_SUPPORT_TEAM.
PLACEHOLDER_FOOTER
